trans-unit.source: Represents the shared-connection version of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowCommitWorkBatchService"></xref> service used by the runtime.
trans-unit.target: Representerar den delade anslutning versionen av den <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowCommitWorkBatchService"> </xref> tjänst som används av körningsmiljön.

trans-unit.source: In this context, shared-connection means that the service uses the same SQL connection for both the tracking and persistence services.
trans-unit.target: I den här kontexten innebär delad anslutning att tjänsten använder samma SQL-anslutning för både spårning och beständiga tjänster.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] The SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService service is used for database transactions that use a shared connection between different objects.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Tjänsten SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService används för databastransaktioner som använder en delad anslutning mellan olika objekt.

trans-unit.source: To use the SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService instead of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.DefaultWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService> in your <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> instance, use the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.AddService%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Att använda SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService i stället för den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.DefaultWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService>i din <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>instans använder den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.AddService%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.AddService%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.DefaultWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > If the SQL server used by the SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService is down such as that caused by SQL cluster failovers or intermittent network issues, the SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService will retry the commit process up to 20 times before raising a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled> event.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > Om SQLServer som används av SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService är nere, till exempel som orsakas av SQL växling vid fel eller nätverksproblem bör SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService kommer att försöka genomförandet upp till 20 gånger innan du höjer en <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled>händelse.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.ServicesExceptionNotHandled>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The constructor is invoked when the workflow runtime engine loads services from an application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Konstruktorn anropas när workflow runtime engine läser in tjänster från en programkonfigurationsfil.

trans-unit.source: The valid key is `EnableRetries`.
trans-unit.target: Giltig nyckel är `EnableRetries`.

trans-unit.source: This requests that the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService"></xref> retry in case of a failed database connection.
trans-unit.target: Detta begär att den <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService"> </xref> försök vid en misslyckad databasanslutning.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService"></xref> class using a database connection string.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService"> </xref> klassen med hjälp av en databasanslutningssträng.

trans-unit.source: Database connection string.
trans-unit.target: Anslutningssträng för databasen.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Gets and sets a value specifying whether the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService"></xref> will retry committing a work batch.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger ett värde som anger om den <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService"> </xref> kommer att försöka igen när en arbetsbatch.

trans-unit.source: Retries of work batch commits for <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TransactionScopeActivity> activities must be modeled into the workflow (usually using a while loop and exception handler outside of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TransactionScopeActivity>).
trans-unit.target: Försök arbete batch incheckningar för <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TransactionScopeActivity>aktiviteter måste modelleras i arbetsflödet (vanligtvis med en när loop och undantag hanterare utanför den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TransactionScopeActivity>).</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TransactionScopeActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TransactionScopeActivity>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService> cannot do retries in this case because it did not start (and therefore does not own) the transaction.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService>inte återförsök i det här fallet eftersom den inte startade (och därför inte äger) transaktionen.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SharedConnectionWorkflowCommitWorkBatchService>

trans-unit.source: Besides being set programmatically, this functionality can be enabled through a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Förutom anges programmässigt, kan den här funktionen aktiveras via en konfigurationsfil.

trans-unit.source: For more information on how to set this property through a configuration file, see [Workflow Configuration Files](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/ada4bb90-6c9d-4f3d-a9d0-b559bb0f9909).
trans-unit.target: Mer information om hur du anger den här egenskapen via en konfigurationsfil finns [arbetsflöde konfigurationsfiler](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/ada4bb90-6c9d-4f3d-a9d0-b559bb0f9909).

trans-unit.source: For general information on retrying work batch transactions, see [Batching State Information in Workflows](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/ecda18ba-9140-4bd7-b13d-6787fdf5959d).
trans-unit.target: Allmän information om du försöker arbete Batchtransaktioner finns [batchbearbetning statusinformation i arbetsflöden](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/ecda18ba-9140-4bd7-b13d-6787fdf5959d).

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the service should retry committing the work batch; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om tjänsten bör försöka genomför arbetsbatch; Annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardvärdet är <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Represents the method called when the workflow runtime raises the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Stopped"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Representerar metoden anropas när arbetsflödets körningsmiljö genererar den <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.Stopped"> </xref> händelse.

trans-unit.source: Represents the method called to start the service.
trans-unit.target: Representerar metoden anropas för att starta tjänsten.
